body.description: The body is the body of the trigger.

characterSetClient.description: The character set used by the client creating the trigger.

collationConnection.description: The collation used for the connection when creating the trigger.

event.description:
The event is the event of the trigger, such as INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE,
 TRUNCATE.

name.description: The name is the name of the trigger.

skipDump.description: Whether to skip this trigger during schema dump operations.

sqlMode.description: The SQL mode setting for the trigger.

timing.description: The timing is the timing of the trigger, such as BEFORE, AFTER.
